scripts.tauri:dev: npm run dev & npm run tauri dev
scripts.tauri:build: npm run build:binaries && npm run tauri build
scripts.build:python: cd backend && . ./.venv/bin/activate && pyinstaller app.py --name backend_server --onefile --noconfirm && mv dist/backend_server ../src-tauri/backend_server && cp ../src-tauri/backend_server ../src-tauri/backend_server-aarch64-apple-darwin
scripts.build:binaries: npm run build:python && (cp backend/bin/ollama src-tauri/ollama && cp src-tauri/ollama src-tauri/ollama-aarch64-apple-darwin) || echo 'Ollama binary not found'
